GapFillInput.Title: Things you buy, colours and sizes

Instruction.FONT: Find the word at the end of each sentence. Type the answers in the gaps.

Content.Question:
1. The sky at night is usually black. (ckalb)
2. I want to buy some furniture for my new house. (eruitnfur)
3. What time is it? I don’t have a watch. (chtwa)
4. I’m not small and I’m not large. I’m medium. (iumdem)
5. I don’t have any nice clothes to wear to the party. (olcthse)
6. I have a briefcase to carry things to work. (riebfcaes)
7. An apple is sometimes red and sometimes green. (ngree)
8. Elsa is beautiful. Does she wear any make-up? (pu-kema)
9. I want an extra large jacket please. (atrxe galer)
10. What size is your sister? I think she’s small. (almsl)
